00043 // NOTES : if the textctrl is focused and the program is ending, a killfocus
00044 //         event is sent in MSW, this is why m_textCtrl is set to NULL in it's
00045 //         destructor and there's so many checks for it not being NULL

00048 // wxSpinCtrlDbl

00051 // the textctrl used for the wxSpinCtrlDbl, needed for keypresses
00052 class wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl : public wxTextCtrl
00053 {
00054 public:
00055     wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl( wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id,
00056                            const wxString &value = wxEmptyString,
00057                            const wxPoint &pos = wxDefaultPosition,
00058                            const wxSize &size = wxDefaultSize,
00059                            long style = 0,
00060                            const wxValidator& validator = wxDefaultValidator,
00061                            const wxString &name = wxTextCtrlNameStr);
00062 
00063     // MSW sends extra kill focus event
00064     virtual ~wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl()
00065     {
00066         if (m_parent) m_parent->m_textCtrl = NULL;
00067         m_parent = NULL;
00068     }
00069 
00070     wxSpinCtrlDbl *m_parent;
00071 
00072     void OnChar( wxKeyEvent &event );         // pass chars to wxSpinCtrlDbl
00073     void OnKillFocus( wxFocusEvent &event );  // sync the spin to textctrl
00074 
00075 private:
00076     DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00077 };

00079 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl,wxTextCtrl)
00080 //  EVT_TEXT_ENTER( wxID_ANY, wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnTextEnter ) // get them from spinctrldbl
00081 //  EVT_TEXT( wxID_ANY, wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnTextUpdate )      // get them from spinctrldbl
00082     EVT_CHAR( wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnChar )
00083     EVT_KILL_FOCUS( wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnKillFocus )
00084 END_EVENT_TABLE()

00086 wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl( wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id,

00090                                               const wxValidator& validator,
00091                                               const wxString &name)
00092                        :wxTextCtrl( parent, id, value, pos, size, style,
00093                                     validator, name)
00094 {
00095     m_parent = (wxSpinCtrlDbl*)parent;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnChar( wxKeyEvent &event )
00099 {
00100     if (m_parent) m_parent->OnChar( event );
00101 }
00102 
00103 void wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl::OnKillFocus( wxFocusEvent &event )
00104 {
00105     if (m_parent) m_parent->SyncSpinToText(true);
00106     event.Skip();
00107 }

00115 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(wxSpinCtrlDbl,wxControl)
00116     EVT_SPIN_UP   ( wxID_ANY, wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnSpinUp    )
00117     EVT_SPIN_DOWN ( wxID_ANY, wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnSpinDown  )

00124 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::Init()
00125 {
00126     m_min = 0;
00127     m_max = 100;
00128     m_value = 0;
00129     m_default_value = 0;
00130     m_increment = 1;
00131     m_digits = wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS;
00132     m_snap_ticks = false;
00133     m_spinButton = NULL;
00134     m_textCtrl = NULL;
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool wxSpinCtrlDbl::Create( wxWindow *parent, wxWindowID id,
00138                             const wxString& value,
00139                             const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size,
00140                             long style,
00141                             double min, double max,
00142                             double initial,
00143                             double increment, int digits,
00144                             const wxString& name)
00145 {
00146     if (!wxControl::Create(parent, id, pos, size, style|wxNO_BORDER,
00147                            wxDefaultValidator, name))
00148         return false;
00149 
00150     wxControl::SetLabel(name);
00151     wxControl::SetBackgroundColour(parent->GetBackgroundColour());
00152     wxControl::SetForegroundColour(parent->GetForegroundColour());
00153 
00154     int width = size.GetWidth(), height = size.GetHeight();
00155 
00156     wxSize best_size( DoGetBestSize() );
00157     if (width  == -1) width  = best_size.GetWidth();
00158     if (height == -1) height = best_size.GetHeight();
00159 
00160     // Create a validator for numbers, +-, and eE for exponential
00161     wxTextValidator validator(wxFILTER_INCLUDE_CHAR_LIST);
00162 
00163 #if wxCHECK_VERSION(2, 5, 4)
00164     wxArrayString list;
00165 
00166     wxString valid_chars(wxT(" 0123456789+-.eE"));
00167     size_t len = valid_chars.Length();
00168     for (size_t i=0; i<len; i++)
00169         list.Add(wxString(valid_chars.GetChar(i)));
00170 
00171     validator.SetIncludes(list);
00172 #else
00173     wxStringList list;
00174 
00175     wxString valid_chars(wxT(" 0123456789+-.eE"));
00176     size_t len = valid_chars.Length();
00177     for (size_t i=0; i<len; i++)
00178         list.Add(wxString(valid_chars.GetChar(i)));
00179 
00180     validator.SetIncludeList(list);
00181 #endif // wxCHECK_VER(2, 5, 4)
00182 
00183     m_spinButton = new wxSpinButton( this, id, wxPoint(0,0), wxSize(-1, height),
00184                                      wxSP_ARROW_KEYS|wxSP_VERTICAL|wxSP_WRAP);
00185     m_textCtrl = new wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl( this, id, value,
00186                       wxPoint(0,0),
00187                       wxSize(width-m_spinButton->GetSize().GetWidth(), height),
00188                       wxTE_NOHIDESEL|wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER, validator);
00189 
00190     DoSetSize( pos.x, pos.y, width, height );
00191     SetBestSize(wxSize(width, height));
00192 
00193     m_min = min;
00194     m_max = max;
00195     m_value = initial;
00196     m_default_value = initial;
00197     m_increment = increment;
00198     SetDigits( digits );
00199 
00200     // set the value here without generating an event
00201     if (!value.IsEmpty())
00202         m_textCtrl->SetValue(value);
00203     else
00204         m_textCtrl->SetValue(wxString::Format(m_textFormat.c_str(), initial));
00205 
00206     return true;
00207 }
00208 
00209 wxSpinCtrlDbl::~wxSpinCtrlDbl()
00210 {
00211     if (m_textCtrl) // null this since MSW sends KILL_FOCUS on deletion
00212     {
00213         m_textCtrl->m_parent = NULL;
00214 
00215         wxSpinCtrlDblTextCtrl *text = m_textCtrl;
00216         m_textCtrl = NULL;
00217         delete text;
00218     }
00219 
00220     delete m_spinButton;
00221     m_spinButton = NULL;
00222 }

00224 #define wxSPINCTRLDBL_SPIN_WIDTH  15
00225 #define wxSPINCTRLDBL_SPIN_HEIGHT 22
00226 
00227 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::DoSetSize(int x, int y, int width, int height, int sizeFlags)
00228 {
00229     //wxPrintf(wxT("DoSetSize %d, %d %d %d %d %d\n"), GetId(), x, y, width, height, sizeFlags);
00230 
00231     wxSize bestSize( DoGetBestSize() );
00232     if (width < 0)  width  = bestSize.GetWidth();
00233     if (height < 0) height = bestSize.GetHeight();
00234 
00235     wxWindow::DoSetSize(x, y, width, height, sizeFlags);
00236 
00237     int spinwidth  = wxSPINCTRLDBL_SPIN_WIDTH;
00238     int spinheight = wxSPINCTRLDBL_SPIN_HEIGHT;
00239     if (m_spinButton)
00240         m_spinButton->GetSize( &spinwidth, &spinheight );
00241 
00242 //NDA
00243         if (m_textCtrl)   m_textCtrl->SetSize( 0, 0, width - spinwidth- 1, height );
00244     if (m_spinButton) m_spinButton->SetSize( width-spinwidth, 0, -1, height );
00245 //
00246 //#ifdef __WIN95__   // humm... these used to be different
00247 //    if (m_textCtrl)   m_textCtrl->SetSize( 0, 0, width - spinwidth- 1, height );
00248 //    if (m_spinButton) m_spinButton->SetSize( width-spinwidth-2, 0, -1, height );
00249 //#else
00250 //    if (m_textCtrl)   m_textCtrl->SetSize( 0, 0, width - spinwidth, height );
00251 //    if (m_spinButton) m_spinButton->SetSize( width-spinwidth, 0, -1, height );
00252 //#endif
00253 }

00255 static wxSize s_spinctrl_bestSize(-999,-999);
00256 
00257 wxSize wxSpinCtrlDbl::DoGetBestSize() const
00258 {
00259     //wxPrintf(wxT("GetBestSize %d\n"), GetId());
00260     if (s_spinctrl_bestSize.x == -999)
00261     {
00262         wxSpinCtrl spin((wxWindow*)this, wxID_ANY);
00263         s_spinctrl_bestSize = spin.GetBestSize();
00264         // oops something went wrong, set to reasonable value
00265         if (s_spinctrl_bestSize.GetWidth()  < 20)
00266             s_spinctrl_bestSize.SetWidth(95);
00267         if (s_spinctrl_bestSize.GetHeight() < 10)
00268             s_spinctrl_bestSize.SetHeight(wxSPINCTRLDBL_SPIN_HEIGHT);
00269     }
00270 
00271     return s_spinctrl_bestSize;
00272 }
00273 
00274 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::DoSendEvent()
00275 {
00276     wxCommandEvent event( wxEVT_COMMAND_SPINCTRL_UPDATED, GetId() );
00277     event.SetEventObject( this );
00278     event.SetInt( (int)(m_value+0.5) );
00279     if (m_textCtrl) event.SetString( m_textCtrl->GetValue() );
00280     GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent( event );
00281 }
00282 
00283 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnSpinUp( wxSpinEvent &WXUNUSED(event) )
00284 {
00285     if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified() )
00286         SyncSpinToText(false);
00287 
00288     if ( InRange(m_value + m_increment) )
00289     {
00290         m_value += m_increment;
00291         SetValue( m_value );
00292         DoSendEvent();
00293     }
00294 }
00295 
00296 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnSpinDown( wxSpinEvent &WXUNUSED(event) )
00297 {
00298     if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified() )
00299         SyncSpinToText(false);
00300 
00301     if ( InRange(m_value - m_increment) )
00302     {
00303         m_value -= m_increment;
00304         SetValue( m_value );
00305         DoSendEvent();
00306     }
00307 }
00308 
00309 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnTextEnter( wxCommandEvent &event )
00310 {
00311     SyncSpinToText(true);
00312     event.Skip();
00313 }
00314 
00315 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnText( wxCommandEvent &event )
00316 {
00317     //wxPrintf(wxT("Text '%s'\n"), event.GetString()); fflush(stdout);
00318     event.Skip();
00319 }
00320 
00321 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnChar( wxKeyEvent &event )
00322 {
00323     double modifier = 1.0;
00324     if ( event.m_shiftDown   ) modifier  = 2.0;
00325     if ( event.m_controlDown ) modifier *= 10.0;
00326     if ( event.m_altDown     ) modifier *= 100.0;
00327 
00328     switch ( event.GetKeyCode() )
00329     {
00330         case WXK_UP :
00331         {
00332             if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified()) SyncSpinToText(false);
00333             SetValue( m_value + m_increment * modifier );
00334             DoSendEvent();
00335             break;
00336         }
00337         case WXK_DOWN :
00338         {
00339             if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified()) SyncSpinToText(false);
00340             SetValue( m_value - m_increment * modifier );
00341             DoSendEvent();
00342             break;
00343         }
00344         case WXK_PRIOR :  // pg-up
00345         {
00346             if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified()) SyncSpinToText(false);
00347             SetValue( m_value + m_increment * 10.0 * modifier );
00348             DoSendEvent();
00349             break;
00350         }
00351         case WXK_NEXT :  // pg-down
00352         {
00353             if (m_textCtrl && m_textCtrl->IsModified()) SyncSpinToText(false);
00354             SetValue( m_value - m_increment * 10.0 * modifier );
00355             DoSendEvent();
00356             break;
00357         }
00358         case WXK_SPACE :
00359         {
00360             SetValue(m_value);
00361             event.Skip(false);
00362             break;
00363         }
00364         case WXK_ESCAPE :
00365         {
00366             SetDefaultValue();
00367             DoSendEvent();
00368             break;
00369         }
00370         case WXK_TAB :
00371         {
00372             wxNavigationKeyEvent new_event;
00373             new_event.SetEventObject( GetParent() );
00374             new_event.SetDirection( !event.ShiftDown() );
00375             // CTRL-TAB changes the (parent) window, i.e. switch notebook page
00376             new_event.SetWindowChange( event.ControlDown() );
00377             new_event.SetCurrentFocus( this );
00378             GetParent()->GetEventHandler()->ProcessEvent( new_event );
00379             break;
00380         }
00381         default : event.Skip(); break;
00382     }
00383 }
00384 
00385 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetValue( double value )
00386 {
00387     if (!m_textCtrl || !InRange(value))
00388         return;
00389 
00390     if ( m_snap_ticks && (m_increment != 0) )
00391     {
00392         double snap_value = (value - m_default_value) / m_increment;
00393 
00394         if (wxFinite(snap_value)) // FIXME what to do about a failure?
00395         {
00396             if (snap_value - floor(snap_value) < ceil(snap_value) - snap_value)
00397                 value = m_default_value + floor(snap_value) * m_increment;
00398             else
00399                 value = m_default_value + ceil(snap_value) * m_increment;
00400         }
00401     }
00402 
00403     wxString str(wxString::Format(m_textFormat.c_str(), value));
00404 
00405     if ((value != m_value) || (str != m_textCtrl->GetValue()))
00406     {
00407         m_textCtrl->SetValue( str );
00408         m_textCtrl->DiscardEdits();
00409         m_value = value;
00410         str.ToDouble( &m_value );    // wysiwyg for textctrl
00411     }
00412 }
00413 
00414 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetValue( const wxString& text, bool force )
00415 {
00416     if (!m_textCtrl) return;
00417 
00418     double value;
00419     if ( text.ToDouble(&value) )
00420         SetValue( value );
00421     else if (force)
00422     {
00423         m_textCtrl->SetValue( text );
00424         m_textCtrl->DiscardEdits();
00425     }
00426 }
00427 
00428 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetRange( double min_val, double max_val )
00429 {
00430     //wxCHECK_RET(max_val > min_val, wxT("invalid spinctrl range"));
00431     m_min = min_val;
00432     m_max = max_val;
00433 
00434     if (HasRange())
00435     {
00436         if (m_value > m_max)
00437             SetValue(m_max);
00438         else if (m_value < m_min)
00439             SetValue(m_min);
00440     }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetIncrement( double increment )
00444 {
00445     m_increment = increment;
00446     SetValue(m_value);
00447 }
00448 
00449 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetDigits( int digits, formatType fmt )
00450 {
00451     wxCHECK_RET(digits >= -1, wxT("invalid spinctrl format"));
00452 
00453     if ((digits == wxSPINCTRLDBL_AUTODIGITS) && (fmt != lg_fmt))
00454     {
00455         wxString wxstr;
00456         int lastplace = -1, extra_digits = 0;
00457         if (fmt == le_fmt)
00458         {
00459             wxstr.Printf(wxT("%le"), m_increment );
00460             wxstr.LowerCase();
00461             lastplace = wxstr.Find(wxT('e')) - 2;
00462             long places;
00463             if (wxstr.AfterFirst(wxT('e')).ToLong(&places))
00464                 extra_digits = int(labs(places));
00465         }
00466         else if (fmt == lf_fmt)
00467         {
00468             wxstr.Printf(wxT("%lf"), m_increment );
00469             lastplace = wxstr.Len()-1;
00470         }
00471 
00472         int decimalplace = wxstr.Find(wxT('.'));
00473 
00474         int i = 0;
00475 
00476         for ( i=lastplace; i>decimalplace; i-- )
00477         {
00478             if ( wxstr.GetChar(i) != wxT('0') )
00479             {
00480                 m_digits = extra_digits + i-decimalplace;
00481                 switch (fmt)
00482                 {
00483                     case le_fmt : m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%.%dle"), m_digits ); break;
00484                     case lf_fmt :
00485                     default     : m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%.%dlg"), m_digits ); break;
00486                 }
00487 
00488                 SetValue(m_value);
00489                 return;
00490             }
00491         }
00492 
00493         m_digits = 0;  // no digits, I guess
00494     }
00495     else
00496         m_digits = digits;
00497 
00498     switch (fmt)
00499     {
00500         case le_fmt : m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%.%dle"), m_digits ); break;
00501         case lg_fmt :
00502         {
00503             if (m_digits == -1)
00504                 m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%lg") );
00505             else
00506                 m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%.%dlg"), m_digits );
00507             break;
00508         }
00509         case lf_fmt :
00510         default     : m_textFormat.Printf(wxT("%%.%dlf"), m_digits ); break;
00511     }
00512 
00513     SetValue(m_value);
00514 }
00515 
00516 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetFormat( const wxString& format )
00517 {
00518     wxString wxstr;
00519     if ( wxstr.Printf(format.c_str(), 123456.123456) > 0 )
00520         m_textFormat = format;
00521 
00522     SetValue(m_value);
00523 }
00524 
00525 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetDefaultValue( double default_value )
00526 {
00527     if ( InRange(default_value) )
00528     {
00529         m_default_value = default_value;
00530         SetDefaultValue();
00531     }
00532 }
00533 
00534 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetSnapToTicks(bool forceTicks)
00535 {
00536     if (m_snap_ticks != forceTicks)
00537     {
00538         m_snap_ticks = forceTicks;
00539         SetValue( m_value );
00540     }
00541 }
00542 
00543 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnFocus( wxFocusEvent &event )
00544 {
00545     if (m_textCtrl)
00546         m_textCtrl->SetFocus(); // this is to pass TAB navigation
00547 
00548     event.Skip();
00549 }
00550 
00551 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::OnKillFocus( wxFocusEvent &event )
00552 {
00553     SyncSpinToText(true);
00554     event.Skip();
00555 }
00556 
00557 void wxSpinCtrlDbl::SyncSpinToText(bool send_event, bool force_valid)
00558 {
00559     if (!m_textCtrl)
00560         return;
00561 
00562     double txt_value;
00563     if ( m_textCtrl->GetValue().ToDouble( &txt_value ) )
00564     {
00565         if ( force_valid || !HasRange() || InRange(txt_value) )
00566         {
00567             if (force_valid && HasRange())
00568             {
00569                 if (txt_value > GetMax())
00570                     txt_value = GetMax();
00571                 else if (txt_value < GetMin())
00572                     txt_value = GetMin();
00573             }
00574 
00575             if (m_value != txt_value)
00576             {
00577                 SetValue( txt_value );
00578                 if (send_event) DoSendEvent();
00579             }
00580         }
00581     }
00582     else if (force_valid)
00583     {
00584         // textctrl is out of sync, discard and reset
00585         SetValue(GetValue());
00586     }
00587 }
00588 
00589 bool wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetFont( const wxFont &font )
00590 {
00591     if (!m_textCtrl) return false;
00592     return m_textCtrl->SetFont( font );
00593 }
00594 wxFont wxSpinCtrlDbl::GetFont() const
00595 {
00596     if (!m_textCtrl) return GetFont();
00597     return m_textCtrl->GetFont();
00598 }

00600 bool wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetBackgroundColour(const wxColour& colour)
00601 {
00602     if (!m_textCtrl) return wxControl::SetBackgroundColour(colour);
00603     bool ret = false;
00604     ret = m_textCtrl->SetBackgroundColour(colour);
00605     m_textCtrl->Refresh(); // FIXME is this necessary in GTK/OSX
00606     return ret;
00607 }
00608 wxColour wxSpinCtrlDbl::GetBackgroundColour() const
00609 {
00610     if (!m_textCtrl) return wxControl::GetBackgroundColour();
00611     return m_textCtrl->GetBackgroundColour();
00612 }
00613 
00614 bool wxSpinCtrlDbl::SetForegroundColour(const wxColour& colour)
00615 {
00616     if (!m_textCtrl) return wxControl::SetForegroundColour(colour);
00617     bool ret = false;
00618     ret = m_textCtrl->SetForegroundColour(colour);
00619     m_textCtrl->Refresh();
00620     return ret;
00621 }
00622 wxColour wxSpinCtrlDbl::GetForegroundColour() const
00623 {
00624     if (!m_textCtrl) return wxControl::GetForegroundColour();
00625     return m_textCtrl->GetForegroundColour();
00626 }

00639         this->m_textCtrl->SetHelpText( helpText);
